description: This Java class 'OpenApiConfig' configures the OpenAPI documentation and security schemes for the 'invoice_backend' system. It sets up JWT Bearer authentication and defines various descriptive tags for different API sections.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that defines the OpenAPI bean implementing API documentation with JWT security.

methods.name: api
methods.description: Creates and returns an OpenAPI object configured with JWT bearer security scheme, API information, and descriptive tags.
